author: Staff Reporter
text:
Demanding the police and district administration to unite him with his wife, C. Arun Kumar (23) of Sulur climbed a mobile phone tower at Chettipalayam and threatened to commit suicide. He climbed the 80-foot-tall tower around 8 a.m. Police said that he owned a plastic moulding unit near his house and was in love with D. Banu Priya (20) of Palladam.

The couple eloped a few weeks ago and got married. Based on a missing complaint lodged by the girl’s parents, the police tracked down the couple.

The girl then left with her parents. Arun Kumar approached the Collector and Superintendent of Police to reunite him with his wife.

Citing no progress in the issue, he climbed the mobile phone tower on Wednesday and threatened to jump. . The high drama came to an end around 7.30 p.m. after a group of journalists assured him that they will help him reunite with his wife.

Held for assaulting Dalits

Two Caste Hindus were arrested and four others booked under sections of the SC/ST (Prevention of Atrocities) Act for allegedly attacking two Dalits at Therampalayam in Karamadai on Monday night. One of the victims, S.R. Ramasamy (40), was returning home after attending a temple festival when a few youth in an inebriated condition picked a quarrel with him.
title: Man climbs cell phone tower, threatens suicide
